part.Short: A cast iron bulb is clamped by a lever with a pull ring. It shifts perspective in low light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Thick and plated bonestuff curves to its host shape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hundreds and hundreds of fossilized hairs crown the body in a protective coat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wide airfoil fin-flaps beat at the wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A caudal barb-thing is tipped with a jewel of venomed dew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of bone extrusions trenched with grooves race to a symmetrical point above the head.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gene-sharpened bone spike pierces the crown.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An addendum of adamantine skull crowns the head in lithophilic regency.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bone fractals burst from the dome in broad and stunning display.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The growth hex of time has sculpted sharp bonestuff in corkscrew tension.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron hooks were fastened to residual leg limbs to provide a graceless, scraping locomotion for their wearer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A preening tool curves out the skull at the painter's angle and is dotted with a pair of breathing motes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A flat beak for spooning mud draws out the lower face.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A beak thins to a long point for pecking through shell and bone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cluster of pluming feathers draw out the shape of the face in splendid color.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A long and fine beak tube narrows to a point for piercing the flower moat and sucking nectar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spaded palms and long claws are shaped to loosen earth and shovel it away.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Crystalline flames crack and lap at the shimmering air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Particles of ice rain sail in small and circular ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wool was dyed in a bath of dreadroot and iron salt, and then woven to warm broad shoulders.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The aching earth belched a ribbon of molten glass onto the Black Stair and anointed a nonet of gas-eating flax-wearers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a length of salt-sucked skin cut from a goat, or tomb ferret, and it's powdered with the white dust of the dead.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coarse flax waist is cinched with a watervine hemp rope.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Particulate from the eons-sheared shale sticks in the fibers of goat wool. They make red freckles on the garment.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ropes of wool are woven in the angled bands of the tartan. They burnish in rich reds, greens, iron greys and sable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rough boar wool is cut to an imprecise semi-circle for throwing over a sun-bleached shoulder in a pinch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Its fine white sheep's wool creases are soiled with the sticky loess of the broad-shouldered world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boar hide was brined, limed, and put in a tanning drum. It was cut and fitted into an apron, and now it's a brown canvas for knife scars and tong burns.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rough tight-spun yard balloons at the calf but cinches at the ankle. The heft of the textile weighs the wide straps down.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Billets of shaved dogwood contour to the breasts, waist, and thigh. The husk is beetle-eaten.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The reedy guts of an ivy tangle were ripped out, laced, and gilded with an embroidered sash.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ancient and inscrutable pegs of chrome fished from the trash sea stud thick wedges of boiled goat leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A scratchy kirtle was taken to a pocket seamstress and accoutered for cave delving and trinket fishing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An apron is pocked with carbon craters the color of the light-sucking void, a thing dreamed by sophists who watched the stars race toward their excluded middle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Linen was cut to body shape and put in a dye bath of dicalyptus leaves and iron shavings to achieve a chromish luster.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rough and itchy flax was coarsely threaded, cut to shape, and cinched by a hemp rope.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather shirt is mantled with sewn-in loops of steel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shiny mesh of linked loops that were sourced from the steel heart of the trash sea.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cane-beat steel is shaped to the pectorial lunes and stitched to an undergarment of padded goat leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vest of mingled fungusfill cut from the molt of a chitinous jungle cat has been painted and glazed lucid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bolt of stretchy, spun fabric was cut to a bodysuit for sneaking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fabrics from across the plateau -- quilted eiderdown, weave-of-brinestalk, sticky elastyne -- have been dyed and sewn to a jacket of colored chaos.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nicked folding metal of dull azure is shaped to the pectorial lunes and stitched to an undergarment of padded goat leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cloth was dyed in a bath of dicalyptus leaves and iron shavings to achieve a chromish luster and then tailored to a ruffled shoulder-skirt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A swathe of elastyne is sheer-stretched over a cuirass of semi-hard plastic, forming a suit of maneuverable mail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blinding light shines off the slick and stretchy suit of vulcanized sap and creates a postpartum amniotic sac.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cuirass of gas-caught foam stiffens instantaneously when pressure is applied. Its karst surface is dusted with the colorful abrasions of chiliads and the chemical reactions they produce; the material has careened past the outer rings of its expected lifetime and into the unknowing void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cuirass of gas-caught foam stiffens instantaneously when pressure is applied. Its karst surface is arrayed with tube sleeves and dusted with the colofur abrasions of chiliads and the chemical reactions they produce; the material has careened past the outer rings of its expected lifetime and into the unknowing void.

part.Name: ReduceEnergyCosts
part.ScopeDescription: the energy cost to apply an injector

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber tubes worm their way through salvaged elastyne filted with filters to recover wastewater from the overworked body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Goat leather is vertipacked with a stratum of loam and the seedlings are nourished to make a walking bush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hyperdense metal in meteor black was superheated and banged to the shoulder and chest shapes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flakes shaved off a big wedge of the gravid metal have been heat-fused to some kind of animal leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The manifold fibers are colorful and have a touching texture like no other fabric. A molecular weft was pulled through shrinking warps on a fractal loom.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tetraglass tubes of coolant and antifreeze snake their way over the keg-mail's compressors, and condenser and evaporator coils spin out the shoulders like grandfather trees above the insulation shrub.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dyed crysteel canisters are fitted to a backrack. Their valves pop out of flux pressurizers, and a splay of hoses allow for several input flows.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dense mesh of dilated tetraglass tubes convey coolant and antifreeze over the keg-mail's jumbo compressors. Blower motors drone a low hum, and condenser and evaporator coils spin out the shoulders like grandfather trees above the insulation shrub.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A calcerous shell was whittled to a hoop dress. Its whorls impress the eye with pleasing geometry before swerving to uncomfortable and dizzying disharmony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wool of many colors was horse-bought from the dromads and sourced beyond the Pale Sea and its great pan of salt. Once the Issachar spun it to yarn on the wheel, a marsh dweller hand-knotted the tzitzit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse goat wool is dethreading from where brushes have combed out the salt and silicon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shorn from the back of a sacred lemur, the hair is laced in a prophet braid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A silk shoulder drape has been cut and dyed with crushed insects shaved from an oak from the Bowl of Iris.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shroud of goat leather is circle-stained by the acids of time.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: There is spotted dazzle on the cut hide that brings its bounded strider to pantherine selfhood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Platinum stitch on a field of salt white brings recognition only to the mirage-trained eyes of the Issachari. The banner has been sewn into a scarlet collar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Force is pushed across bronze spines through an improbable series of flapping motions, whereupon parasols pop open to catch the mercurial wind.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hair of unknown origin sticks to the diamond pattern on nylon hip and shoulder straps. Zippered and buttoned pouches allow for the lugging of all the underearth tools one needs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The crocheted leaf and moss-mass that carpets the hot-smoking yurts of goatfolk has been sewn to a leather collar, giving its wearer the appearance of a creeping bush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft fur is cut from the alabaster pelt of an albino ape into a broad-shouldered cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bees crawl over the back-mounted slatted rack. A few more dart around nearby.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shining stitch in the style of circuitry forks down the shoulder fabric.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An old ropeworking ritual was used to weave a back-worn net of fibrous and supportive straps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A silvery flowing cloth moves with the lightness of fabric and then hardens in stillness or under the pressure of contact. A light patina is starting to form on the stitch.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thousand-thread coverture is given its candescent hue by the bluing ore and the harsh light of the Great Desert's foreign and eastern shelf.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Articulated blades unfold to form an aerial screw that gets blown upward by an air thruster mounted below. On activation, the equipper takes flight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gloved prosthetic hands attach to the ends of articulating rods. The control mechanism is housed in a false spine box.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Air circulates and the sheet-standard breathes; the edges of the red diamond shrink and lengthen. Blood courses through the arteries of time and into the tissue of the new flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Movement puts the birds stitched into the soft pleats of cloth into stuttery animation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slate tubes assemble to scaffold the human form.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Points of discontiguous matter flock in a crescent to a mock wind. Together they bend light across its full spectrum and blur the wearer's torso to a polychrome mess.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of an ogre ape into a broad-shouldered cloak.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cerata pendulate on the cape like prism grass of a windy meadow. They mirror rich hues in cerulean, ruby, star orchid, and void; together they shine to resplendent effect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Electrodes shine on the lattice across the uuflax weave. Sleeves, widened in fashion, display the gold and cyan heraldic circuitry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gargantuan slab of burned and rolled chrome was unjointed from an earth-mover. It shadows its monstrous wielder like a starsail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Twigs from the witching tree are pared and twisted to a garland for hindsun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The crown is crushed by wear into a hundred papery creases, and the brim is stained in the fractal signatures of sweat and salt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In wool paper and acrylic the pain of experience is smoothed away into the uniform child's cone. Arterial clamps peek out from the interior surface. The cone is fastened by a brass chain, adorned by beads of glass, and branded on the apex with the Holy Rhombus, a sign of the price of innocence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A leather wrap for the skull is stitched in the brimless style for those who prefer fitting into cracks over shading the jeweled eye.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Red lace wreathes the face to accent the sun-gladdened cheeks of a vintner's wife.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hideous beak cants over the brain cavity and shades the face in the frightening light of a dim and aching sun.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A second skull was raised as a cone from a sheet of desulfurized metal. Tiny initials are scratched in.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cap of gunk material that arconauts call black stretch was fished from rubber grottos and stuck to the scalp.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spiral cavemouth of xanthous shell armors the head while only minorly impairing vision.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft fur is cut from the alabaster pelt of an albino ape into a tam with earflaps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wearable square is modeled on the bricklayer's mortar board and decorated with a colored tassel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hole-cut sheet of steel links fits over the head and neck.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The moss-strewn antlers of some great elk appear to have grown through an ageless, leather helm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A halogen light sits affixed to a leather head strap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dome of iron and hardened pulp contains its own source of illumination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hood of gas-caught foam stiffens instantaneously when pressure is applied. Its karst surface is dusted with the colorful abrasions of chiliads and the chemical reactions they produce; the material has careened past the outer rings of its expected lifetime and into the unknowing void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leaves grow over a domed layer of wearable topsoil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fluted visor is satcheled in strands of tungsten filament. Two antennae coil out the temples in robotic likeness.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The stone-dented metal of aging dusk wraps the brain in a second skull.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a hat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of an ogre ape into a tam with earflaps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Airy thoughtstuff was deposited by the pressure of the material realm into a jellified substance and curled into a cirlet. It's bejeweled with crystalline microlife, symbiotes hatched in the thick of the psychic sea.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Failed psychic attacks against you cause the attacker to hemorrhage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A calcerous shell was chopped off at the tip. Its whorls impress the eye with pleasing geometry before swerving to uncomfortable and dizzying disharmony.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crinkle-sheet of papery metal pokes at the angle of repose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tetraxenonoglass blueshifts light hitting the outer shell. On the inner side, electromagnets excite a lining of star mollusk tissue to create the perfect psychic accoustics.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cloth in the sunbanning hue of salt sight is folded snug to the fit of head and neck.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The sun beams on soapstone with cheeks made high and proud of ochre and teeth. The shadow of a noon canopy bespeaks a treeline thicker with leaflife than any on the plateau or at all north of Moghra'yi.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The moon scowls on an unseen jungle, the craters of brow shaded with animal ash and eaten to a natural ridgeline by the venomous breathe of gods.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hot fire on soapstone bleeds into damp night at a twilight terminus drawn in blood. The mask wearer assumes this and all dualities.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In wool paper and acrylic the pain of experience is smoothed away into the aspect of a child. Neuronal clamps peek out from the concave interior surface. The mask is fastened by a brass chain, adorned by beads of glass, and branded on the forehead with the Holy Rhombus, a sign of the price of innocence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome-brass rings and swarths of leather are precisely cut from a tinker's stencil, but the real signature is on the glass: a scatter of speck-sized fractures from the high salt gales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light flecks break themselves on the silver moat and rush back to their place of origin. The signifier becomes the signified; the simulacrum is realized.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Focus-ringed binoculars read the tells of infrared light and produce a textured picture of eye-warm greens.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A folded triangle pouch of burlap was impregnated with vinewood sap to absorb noxious vapor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A durable plastic mask has been fitted with a simple filter to protect against noxious gas.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Curved glass caps the narrowest in a series of concentric brass tubes. The widest one is fitted with a leather head-strap.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: Grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 5.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Two almonds of glass sit in wireframe cups and resharpen the world's edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The hoops sport rhombic facets that reflect light at wavelengths between plum and quartz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Silver was melted and cast to a perfect sphere in isomorphic veneration of the Kasaphescence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The glass lune is showered in information across the electromagnetic channels.

part.Name: Description
part.Short:
Visual Instrument and Sensory Augmentation (G Edition)
Data is painted back and forth between the glass lunes of visor and wristlet. Whereas the outer trim shines gold on F Edition, on this model it fades to grey.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ring-molds on the laminated metal frame collect ambient sensory data and use it to augment the viewing frustum.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Grants night vision. You can see two spaces beyond the first occluding object in your line of sight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quickened dreamstuff swells to tidal forces and electrifies the membrane of the rondure. It gives off smoke in marble.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Geometry swims across the crystal diodes of the mask. Its expression is smiling in the hypnagognic key.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass arches cut and fished from the trash sea have been paired by palette and cored into beads. They've been hung on a dried strand of goat gut and bartered up and down the River Svy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A broad tube of pipeline copper is a makeshift gorget. It's splashed in patterns of worm blood and sea rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A glass lens encages a magnetized needle and sits inside a leather wristband.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Miniature airfoil blades spin on the circular face and blow gentle air.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Provides a small amount of cooling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slender cut of brass was forged in a serpentine crucible and painted with the vexing stripes of nature.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This simple arm brace is crafted from boiled boar leather and tied on with braided lace. The strips of protective hide are designed to redirect glancing blows to the arm and protect poor archers from their own errant bowstrings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a shifting minichart of lifesign voltages picked up in the heat and sound signatures of nearby fauna.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: On the wrist mount, echo-shaped models in three dimensions expose the structural irregularities of simple inanimate objects nearby.

object.Name: Child of the Deep Structural Scanning Bracelet

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bangle clasp features a bright cobalt button. "You think this is the real =name=? It is."

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small hexagonal switch sits across an unadorned wristcuff of chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Diodes burn their cyan light through an atmosphere of glass curved around a metal link.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When equipped and powered, this item grants a bonus to identifying artifacts as if your Intelligence score were increased by 2.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gridlines and a red dot are painted on the glass lune, and simple rectangles depict the once-ordered streets of chromium that've since burst like gnarled roots through space and time.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A knitted sleeve warms itself through contact static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slick grease-stuff coats the hexagonally-arranged pores across the surface of the metal torus. There's a push cap for lubricant refills.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hieroglyphs of fluctation are incised on the inner surface of this shiny metal torus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plutonic metal is etched with a two-dimensional projection of the rhombic dodecahedral honeycomb, allowing it to snap onto the ley lines of the local region.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bars partition the bangle clasp into three bands; a cobalt button summons the rest of the quartet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A dial clicks at right intervals on the metal wrist, and mercurial silver courses through tubework along the plastifer sleeve.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Handwear cut from the hides of down-canyon boars and worn by brinecutters to guard against the briars of the stalk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hundredth-generation canyoner cut goat hide to the modeling shape of a bone hand that stuck out their workshop wall of ancient lime.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Steel scales dusted in salt cord the fingers and wrist in a metal exoskeleton.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Skin-tight gloves of a conducting mesh jolt the hands into high performance.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft fur is cut from the alabaster pelt of an albino ape into thick-fingered gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Mitts of gunk material that arconauts call black stretch was fished from rubber grottos and tailored to hand.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leather gloves are steeled by extruded wire meticulously curled into hundreds of chain links.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nicked folding metal of dull azure is hand-cut and stitched to a pair of undergloves made from padded goat leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gloves of gas-caught foam stiffen instantaneously when pressure is applied. Their karst surfaces are dusted with the colorful abrasions of chiliads and the chemical reactions they produce; their material has careened past the outer rings of its expected lifetime and into the unknowing void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hyperdense metal in meteor black was superheated and banged to articulated finger and palm shape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Prism-studded skin was shorn from a dead monkey and sawed into a pair of gloves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Coarse fur is cut from the thickset pelt of an ogre ape into wide-fingered gloves, and giant knuckles sawed to points stick through.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cerata pendulate on the muffs like crystal-mold on a tree ring. They mirror rich hues in cerulean, ruby, star orchid, and void; together they shine to resplendent effect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fullerene finger extensors splay like fashionable court nails. Their girths are shrunk or unshrunk to task requirements by minuscule servos embedded in the webbing.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Your weapons' percentage-based effects are 3X as likely to occur, including the base chance for critical hits.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Channel grooves are cut into the gloves' static-dried palms in the impossible patterns of leyline geometry. The fingers articulate at intersecting radials and spin the latent into being.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Requires 1 dram of neutron flux to function. Very tiny chance each round neutron flux is consumed. +10 psychic glimmer

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boar leather vamps are scuffed with little fissures sparking in wind-rasped quartz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of strapped shoes are cracked on the soles in sinelike patterns of gravel walking.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scutes are arranged like stony pikes around the apron of the shoe. Light reflects off the enamel shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cord of gold wire fished from the computing guts of the underearth lace the shoe-tailored leather of a dead boar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From welt to shank under the ink-smudged boot, a thin plate of magnetized nickel force-welds the wearer to the iron loam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A canyon pearl fastens sandal straps embroidered in the syncretic imagery of swiftwater nymphs. Like the glacier flow itself, the veneration of Calypso moved with the mystai down the sundered honeycomb and in through the shale fissures beneath the olive mount. There it fractured into the mysteries of the many-named wives, where the memory of freshwater became more faceted than its smooth surface of origin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Leather boots are steeled by extruded wire meticulously curled into hundreds of chain links.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Steel bands bearing their prying scars have been riveted to a pair of pleated boar leather boots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A swath of gunk material that arconauts call black stretch was fished from rubber grottos and stuck to the feet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nicked folding metal of dull azure bands a pair of lake-fished boots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Some clever tinker has fused a spring-loaded tendon around each boot to mimic the gait of a large, sprinting bird.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: As long as you have worn this item for at least 100 rounds, you sprint at thrice your movement speed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Steel bands bearing their prying scars have been riveted to a pair of pleated boar leather boots. Their soles have been smeared with sliding wax swabbed off the hydraulic presses of the Eaters' tomb.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair gas-caught foam sneaks stiffen instantaneously when pressure is applied. Their karst surfaces are dusted with the colorful abrasions of chiliads and the chemical reactions they produce; the material has careened past the outer rings of its expected lifetime and into the unknowing void.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Silver wire cinches a feathery cut of skin from the ghostly yeshyr, hunted in the orchard ruins north of Odrum. They are fastened by a smoking pearl.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Welded bands of aging dusk shield the legs but weigh their wearer to the earth like ore.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ankle is cinched by a leather strap and goldleaf buckle; crushed plant matter soils the soles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The finned and wheeled boot had become the sigil of several sects of socionauts by the Late Sultanate. For decades their progenitors careened through the capsule pipelines of the slouching arcology, dismantling it plate by plate, pursued by the constabulary but ferried by their skates to the safety of their moss-skirted hideouts. The metaphor was writ large on the glass guts of the city: Scorch the past. Rocket into the future.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Heats up the area around the wearer when in operation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Calligraphs are incised in uneven rows and columns that meander across the quarter and back stay of the boot. Their character mass appears to orbit a central statement: "The path is contracted." The rest of the script is etched in a variety of signs and styles that offer competing and composite interpretations of the cryptic proclamation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue. Casts mottled with dust particles were culled and fed to lithovores, leaving only the perfect hexagonal prisms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A kaleidoscopic tartan textures the tongue and vamp. On the backstay, a diode square displays the image of a morphing wall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ur-metal strips on the soles are magnetized by bosonic coils, producing a continuous ribbon of negative-mass bubbles that repel the wearer upward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cerata pendulate on the shoe tips like the Beetle Moon curled through fog. They mirror rich hues in cerulean, ruby, star orchid, and void; together they shine to resplendent effect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Quark-gluon plasma rapidly cooled and was extinguished on the voidpeaks of the early universe, except where the globules got trapped in 6D kinks of spacetime. There they glided in the slipstream for billions of years until beings discovered them, built machines to extract and cool them, and reheat them in their stellar furnaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shining jewel, container for gigantic melancholies and gigantic mirths alike, is beset inside a strapped sandal of sheyd leather.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A torso-length lens haloed in refraction waves is suspended in mid air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mote of gentle light darts about in the patterns of life.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Emits light in radius 4. Extinguished permanently when unequipped.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Color swirls around a mote of glow dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A phosphorescent opal-like fits in the palm of a hand and glows with the light of auroras absorbed chiliads ago. It floats about preternaturally.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Particles blip off a probabilistic core and appear traced across discrete shells of energy.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's a robotic eye lidded by a furcate chassis and embellished with antenna lashes. A minuscule barrel pokes out from its pupil and vibrates. The inner lid is articulated, allowing the drone to scan for incoming projectiles and shoot them down with laser light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Giant, flattened rings of hypercooled crysteel correlate their wearer to an astronomical body and serve as celestial equator, declination, and meridian. Their edges are filed on a nanon lathe and slice through orbiting debris.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A black particle defies the light-drenched world and charts a helical orbit.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 to all mutation levels +6 to cybernetics license tier

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: circle of light in the chord of {{agolgot|Agolgot}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minarets of raw bile hue, blackrot, and poison jade wheel about a zeropoint and blur in iridescence to a rainbow of malady.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: circle of light in the chord of {{bethsaida|Bethsaida}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minarets of viscus hue, hair/nail flax, and bloodclot ruby wheel about a zeropoint and blur in iridescence to a rainbow of lifeslush.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: circle of light in the chord of {{qas|Qas}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minarets of force potential, lustreless chrome, and greyscale wheel about a zeropoint and blur in iridescence to a hexagonal rainbow.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: circle of light in the chord of {{qon|Qon}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minarets of dazzle paint, abyssal shine, and subconscious fuzz wheel about a zeropoint and blur in iridescence to a rainbow of stupor.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: circle of light in the chord of {{rermadon|Rermadon}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minarets of auroral gas, electrified emerald, and fused metals wheel about a zeropoint and blur in iridescence to a rainbow of plasma.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: circle of light in the chord of {{shugruith|Shugruith}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Minarets of shale dust hue, crushed snail, and sparking marble wheel about a zeropoint and blur in iridescence to a rainbow of mineral.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wheel of dogthorn cut with hill-clan sigilwork is secured to the arm by a leather strap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A blushing cheek of mined iron was hammered to a wheel for arm defense.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A loop of polished steel was stamp-cut from a toppled metal press and fit with a holding bar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A steel kite flaunts the hieroglyphs of tooth and claw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A blue kite flaunts the hieroglyphs of tooth and claw.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The broad and tall aegis is a halved kite of sunbeam and starless dusk, and painted across her sword-nicked plane is the Holy Rhombus of the Temple.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blast furnaces sucked the tidal energy out of the planet, heated carbon to solar temperatures, and poured it into hexagonal molds. The emerald tongs used to retrieve the casts atomized and vented vanadium -- the green glint -- into the manifold, imperfecting the metal and conferring its characteristic hue.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An earthen pot of Svy mud fired in a marsh oven captures a few handfuls from the soil sea and contains them in a bubble world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal frames are mounted on treads to protect against wheel-cramming detritus.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A layer cake of wide-age rust grants dimension to the ancient and flat-faced astagon. Its front is painted with the coat of arms of an archaic house -- white runic script on a field of crimson.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 Ego You may activate this item to conjure a force field in front of you. Robots will often be unable to advance toward you while the force field is active.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You recovered the lost aegis of House Yish, =this.refname=.
part.Hagiograph: Recall how =name= wrested the legendary aegis =this.refname= from the paws of a lowly snapjaw and averred descendency from the Saads of Yish!
part.Gospel: At the Battle of =landmark.nearest|title=, =name= fought to subjugate snapjaws. =player.Subjective= wielded a buckler with such <spice.commonPhrases.finesse.!random> that it became forever known as =this.refname=.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Boartooth beads on the ancient charm are worn to nubs by the cartilage of time, but the flexing cable that holds them together is as strong as the day it was woven. Dangling from the bracelet is a figurine of an overstuffed deer, carved from a mysterious substance that cracks light like crystal but weighs like metal, producing a shaded lifelikeness elsewhere unseen.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A different glyph for 'life' is light-etched on each of its shining chrome segments.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A girdle of ribboned muscle squeezes the wrist and wets it with a burning grease.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You take half damage from poison.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Two turrets of sun-conducting chrome cap cylinders of burning gas, which straddle a metal trellis of spades girding some sort of guild mark. A 6-helix of fume, signature of the star engine this flier is wrought through, twirls toward the sky.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You may activate this item to start dashing. While dashing, whenever you move in a direction, you dash up to 20 spaces toward the nearest enemy or obstacle and perform an attack. For every three spaces you dash, you get +2 to hit and +2 to penetration rolls.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: The Sky-Bear flies anew! From the clutches of the frozen past, you recovered =this.refname=.
part.Hagiograph: The hot, wet breath of the underearth defossilized the Sky-Bear and apprised us of this truth: =name= is Saad Amus, Saad Amus is =name=.
part.Gospel: Throughout all of =month=, =name= <spice.commonPhrases.ravaged.!random> the province of Bethesda Susa on =player.possessive= jetpack, <spice.elements.entity$elements[random].ravaging.!random> of =mostHatedFaction.t= and =secondMostHatedFaction.t=. =player.Subjective= became known as the Bethesda <spice.commonPhrases.scourge.!random.capitalize>.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Once-familiar paper, paint, and beads are rearranged to a beastly shape. Pale lights of Spindle color gleam in the eye sockets, and a wicked beak opens in menacing stillness. Across the visage brass chains fasten the pieces of torn innocence that craft the Murmur.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This black slab of metal has been burnished clean of any symbol that may once have emblazoned its matte surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From deep as stratum 29, this cape was knit from trash; a thousand years of history now draped across the ass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cross-section of trash reef has been whittled to the shape of a star. Chiliads of life-things, rocks, and ersatz matter ribbon its arms: a mosaic of polyps, a bouquet of kelp, burned glass, minted chrome, nebula shell, iris milk, and stray photonic fuzz peeled from a decaying hologram.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: This item doesn't need to be equipped for its effects to be active.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A starless, triangular prism of black glass holds still.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You clutched the black glass of the =this.refname= in your hands.
part.Hagiograph: Amaranthine =name=! Cower before the god-sultan who is wrought of =player.possessive= own dreamstuff, who bears the black glass!
part.Gospel: While wandering in the jungle near Kyakukya, =name= dreamed =player.subjective= orbited a darkling star and in its vast accretion disk piled the building blocks of self. From then on, =name= kept a starless, triangular prism on =player.possessive= person.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp points are run through with bright and brilliant amethyst and sapphire. The colors remain but smolder to heather in their dying light. The chime is grave-still.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Byzantine purple smolders at a medium hue on the sharp and linked prisms of the crystal. It hums with new life and ingenuity.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Grants you Quicken Mind: refresh a random cooldown on use.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Broken crystal narrows to a hateful razor at the shard seams. It cracked at the resonance curvature of anguish, and fell out of its host rock as a shattered promise.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Attacks MA instead of AV.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A curtain of thrumming cables make a mantle for hunched shoulders. They pitch at neuronal frequencies long dormant.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When powered, this item grants a 40% chance that a tinkered item will have a random item modification. This may include item modifications that aren't normally tinkerable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ocean drum of unknown zircon cleans itself of dust down to the mote by electrostatic cancelling. The center cross affords a wielder's grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A thorn crown arranged of crystals at telling psionic angles make a landmark in the psychic sea.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ribbed cable of tangent needle points squeezes the limb and quickens its biomatter beyond expectation.

part.Name: IntPropertyChanger
part.BehaviorDescription: Wearer may take any action while sprinting at no additional penalty.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shining jewels are scattered across the contours of a galactic visage, and edges drawn between them sketch the outline of a sashed Fool. Far away at the chrome crest, beads of bright and searing light suggest the shape of a medial ewer, and beyond its spout, a vast and timeful structure. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +1 to all mutation levels +6 to cybernetics license tier

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burning rubies, carnelians, and garnets are arranged as a warm and giving sun. Diminutive rocky orbs pass by in the near space of the visage, and in the far space a prism of freight lengthens into a wider void. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: On the countenance, ribbons of alabaster cloud circumscribe a lapis sea and forests of jade. At the median of it all, a Spindle pierces the outer rondure and disappears beyond the composition. A second obstructed spire, what must be the Spindle's shadow, soaks up the light thrown off by the southern sky of crystal white. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jasper rocks break on the edges of the mask and hem in a pale sea of milky quartz. The Spindle bisects the wide Face, and symmetry blooms beneath it. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A single mount of inlaid basalt and malachite splays open; an image of the Spindle blossoms from its center and dominates the festooned aspect. The inside of the mask is ribboned with burnt tracery from where it was molded on a gallium lathe, then dyed with the milked irises of shedim and set to dry in a pool of warm static.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bowed lune is cracked from where it was smashed off the gallium lathe. The shedim had no eyes left to color the dim and final Face, and it lay too long discarded in a pool of warm static. The sultanate is broken.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Though it is approximately the size and heft of a human infant, this shiny black device's shape is more akin to a fetus torn early from the womb. Its surface is slick and warm, with a pale pulse breathing somewhere underneath its pitch-black skin. At the end of its tail is an orifice studded with hooked teeth, eternally questing for an anchor point that it never finds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: All-color nacre is hardened into an ontologically perfect shape; the mathematics of spheres are mere approximations. Inside, ribboned patterns of aether are frozen in stasis and cohere as a moonlit vista, a scene somehow tethered to the spacetime point whence you observed it. The meaning of this pairing is unknown and unknowable.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: +40 psychic glimmer Objects you find are five times more likely to come from other dimensions.

part.Name: TakenAccomplishment
part.Text: You clutched =this.refname= and dressed yourself in the mirror of realities.
part.Hagiograph: O! Our hearts turned to stellar remnants when =name= recited an elegy for the unknown girlchild Eudoxia!
part.Gospel: In the month =month= of =year=, a corrupt administrator was appointed minister of a gleaming city with streets of gold and glass. <spice.pronouns.subject.!random.capitalize> outlawed the practice of composing elegies, and =name= was forced to flee.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gigantic whorl lip snapped off the driving wheel of culture, fell out of its star vault's orbit, and, through the eroded methods of time, arrived here. Astroexotic spores lash its metasteel underrim, pilgrims from a hot fungal core biding time between now and some mystifying future point.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A blooming kitesail of extrasolar flax is knitted on battens to catch the poison air of some faraway swamp planetoid and power an ecumenical cycle. Its clews are stitched with syncretic plethora from across the dreaming gamut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Unshafted from its lanterned machine temple orbiting a star some hundred thousand light years away, the great gear looms in stasis. Dust from a hundred neighbored planet-homes tip its fluted teeth, while its bore is slick with amaranth and incense oil cultured over the lifespan of a gardened civilization.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Wielded weapons blocked by this shield have a 10% chance to be disarmed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A giant clockface is traced with lemniscates to gauge the entheogenic pressures building in abyssal sun cores. The priest of the machine who took its readings and sung the dial left is indebted to the distant colleague whose klatch invented the whistled language 8000 years later.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Berate, Intimidate, and Menacing Stare also confuse per Confusion rank 10.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tube of tetraxenonoglass glass glitters inside with opaline syrup.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: You gain either a permanent +2 bonus to a random attribute or two mutation points.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Light catches on four opaline corner pieces and a raised medallion set in the center of tessellated uuflax. Wonders are woven across the cyclopean tome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial bell iron is shaped to an axe edge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ceremonial slag steel is shaped to an axe edge.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ceremonial chrome wheel clicks to moon time, and the grip medallion shines in delphian lineage.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black acrylic grips are paired off the sides of ceremonial chrome magazine well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tin-slender clip hangs off the ceremonial chrome magazine well.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny glyphs are inscribed on each exterior face of the handheld box.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish nursed in the aquarium silos of a vacated sector were netted and skinned into strips. Those strips were tanned with chrome and stitched into this vest.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This frock is knit from imperishable uuflax stolen from an archway garden during a union dispute between the weavers' guild and the high-strata window makers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wrested from the liminal tiers of a shale-toppled spire, this animal skull was handed over to an etcher for decoration.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and sewn into a headdress.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Masks maintained their sacred status in the lives of the Eaters, even as they lost the capacity to stitch them into their own faces. This one is no different.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An imperishable uuflax sheet was torn from the elephantine spools in the market and stitched into a talma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather was worn by fishworkers in the earlier sultanate, but by the time of *sultan* it was prized by gentlefolk. This pair is exquisitely crafted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: While the steeple fires raged below, brave arconauts sank into the glowing depths to retrieve valuables. When their corpses were found, the sand in their pockets had been blown into glass beads. Sometime after, those beads were strung into a bracelet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perch fish leather boots, finest make. They were either stolen from the crypt of an older Eater or fashioned by a cordwainer to look like it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chipped-off chunk of Spindle, magnetized by the fall to earth, orbits its chosen warden.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Far from the soaring aegides of earlier periods, this concave ward was merely bent and polished on a municipal lathe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome flakes fell like dander from broken belfries into the trash sea. They were scooped up by orefishers and traded up the silk chain. This shirt is fashioned from the flakes twisted into rings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early period Eaters modded their genes to grow ur-filament hair. Later, once that technology was lost, graverobbers sheared it from their cadaverous scalps. In the time of *sultan*, it was called finery. This vest was knit from the stuff.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Early Eaters had enlarged their skulls for cosmetic reasons. By the time of *sultan*, the high minaret dwellers took to wearing them as helms. This one is exquisitely decorated.

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description

part.Name: Description
part.Short: When they were active, the crysteel blast furnaces belched slag into a belt of hills that cinctured the old arcology. In the age of *sultan*, the slag was mined and moulded into a glass replica of a crysteel hauberk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber insulation that diamond-tiled the high pneumatic ducts was cut free at midnight and ferried to a coven of tailors, who then stitched a bodice.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In vast abyssal halls spire-tall machine presses crushed black spheres into diamond killer. Once the lights burned out, magpie troupes cut hunks free with gaslight tools and brought them to the low-strata smitheries. This piece was forged into a cuirass.

part.Short: A saw-toothed bladestick of bleached chitin is still stuck to by the gore bits of a dead salthopper's last meal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This figurine worked from *material* intricately depicts *creature.an*:

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Your midsection sags with softened flesh.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A ponderous gut laps over the curve of your hips, weighing you down significantly

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Your body is enveloped in so much flab that typical musculature cannot support it. Strengthen yourself, or be immobilized.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A shorn trinket of something-or-other, popped off the overtaxed seam of someone's straining garments.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scratches checker the length of edged bell bronze, and skin oil dampens the leather grip.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spring-loaded platform bears the load of a passenger, and indicates their weight.
